ygData.msgSnippet: All the necro has to so is start out with cancel magic.    there goes one buff... or ... lets see... lifespikes cant be resisted and do not place an
ygData.messageBody:
All the necro has to so is start out with cancel magic. there goes
one buff... or ... lets see... lifespikes cant be resisted and do not
place an icon.......

Is a good cheat till they figure it out tho

Thanos, Human Necro

>>> "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...> 07/21 1:39 PM >>>
From: "Fling, Kirby" <FlingKirby@...>

Oh my! that's the best "cheat" I've read on this list in a long
time!!

What a great way to spank those arrogant DE necros that think they
own PvP.

Thanks!

-----Original Message-----
Your character can only have a 15 conditions affecting him or her at
one
time. If you are going into a battle with something that has a
really
nasty condition (like when fighting necros or crits that charm) Get
a
Shaman load a bunch of buffs on you. Then you will not be bothered
by
the harmful stuff. You can try this yourself. I am a lvl 24 Shaman
so
I cast all my buffs and filled all the slots up(5 stat buffs, 5
resistance buffs, 2 sight buffs, my ac/hp buff, my ac only buff and
SoW)
Then I cast Envenomed Breath on myself. I didn't get the usual
resist
message, but I didn't take damage and I didn't get the poison icon.
